column4: how do i check (in the CLI) what filesystems the partitions use?
did you installed the restricted drivers ?
keep in mind that glxgears is not a benchmark. have you tried any other 3d app?
well i know that when i play UT2004 in windows i get 200-300 FPS, in linux i get 10-60
well i dunno; my 7300GT performs more or less like in windows
where do i find solutions to this problem?
maybe in nvidia linux forums ? have you checked thngs in nvidia-settings ?
depends if you want to suspend to disk you need > 1GiB if not 512 MiB just in case should be enough
